Chinese.name: 视频文件转RTMP推流
Chinese.description: 使用ffmpeg+云函数+API网关，快速构建视频文件转RTMP推流服务。
Chinese.attention: 1. 本示例需要API网关触发器配合使用；2. 缓存播放进度需要引入持久化存储；

English.name: VideoToRTMP
English.description: This example demonstrates transcoding video files to RTMP push streaming based on ffmpeg.
English.attention: This example needs to configure the API gateway trigger. Caching playback progress requires the introduction of persistent storage.
